summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A TEGOL OUTLAW MOTORCYCLE HELMET, MODEL V5-15 F BLACK EAGLE, SIZE: LARGE. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTIFICATION FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17E015000 (EQUIPMENT). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 1-866-371-0281 FOR THE LAST TWO MONTHS. THE CONTACT LEFT THE REQUIRED VOICEMAIL WITH HIS INFORMATION FOR A CALL BACK, BUT NO RESPONSE WAS RECEIVED. AN EMAIL WAS NOT SENT. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REMEDY/ REFUND. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
